select * from project_test.persistence where word = #{word} order by likes+0 desc;

insert into project_test.persistence (date, word, translation, word_id, likes) VALUES (#{date},#{word},#{translation},#{wordId},#{likes});

update project_test.persistence set likes = likes+1 where translation = #{translation}
